original: paṭikkhipati, na pavāretīti sabbattha vuttanayeneva kāraṇaṃ veditabbaṃ.

original: na pavāreti. Kasmā? Vippakatabhojanabhāvassa upacchinnattā. Yopi aññatra gantvā bhuñjitukāmo

analyzed: yam āsannataram aṅgam tassa orimantena paricchinditvā aḍḍhateyya hatthaḥ hattha pāsaḥ ti

original: veditabbo. Tasmiṃ ṭhatvā abhihaṭaṃ paṭikkhipantasseva pavāraṇā hoti, na tato paraṃ.
analyzed: veditabbaḥ tasmin ṭhatvā abhihaṭam paṭikkhipantassa iva pavāraṇā hoti na tatas param

analyzed: tam paṭikkhipataḥ pavāraṇā hoti

original: Anatirittanti na atirittaṃ; na adhikanti attho. Taṃ pana yasmā kappiyakatādīhi sattahi

original: pharaṇakāni aṭṭhīni yāvakālikāni. Madhukaṭṭhi punnāgaṭṭhi harītakādīnaṃ aṭṭhīni siddhatthakaṭṭhi
analyzed: pharaṇakāni aṭṭhīni yāvakālikāni madhuka ṭṭhi punnāga ṭṭhi harītaka ādīnam aṭṭhīni siddhatthaka ṭṭhi

original: rājikaṭṭhīti evamādīni aṭṭhīni yāvajīvikāni. Tesaṃ pāḷiyaṃ phalabhesajjeneva saṅgaho veditabbo.
analyzed: rājika ṭṭhī iti evamādīni aṭṭhīni yāvajīvikāni tesam pāḷiyam phala bhesajjena iva saṅgahaḥ veditabbo

original: Piṭṭhakhādanīye sattannaṃ tāva dhaññānaṃ dhaññānulomānaṃ aparaṇṇānañca piṭṭhaṃ panasapiṭṭhaṃ
analyzed: piṭṭha khādanīye sattannam tāva dhaññānam dhañña anulomānam aparaṇṇānam ca piṭṭham panasa piṭṭham

analyzed: labuja piṭṭham ambāṭaka piṭṭham sāla piṭṭham dhotaka tāla piṭṭham ca khīra valli piṭṭham ca ati

analyzed: evamādīni tesu tesu janapadesu pakati āhāra vasena manussānam khādanīya attham bhojanīya attham ca

analyzed: pharaṇakāni piṭṭhāni yāvakālikāni adhotakam tāla piṭṭham khīra valli piṭṭham assa gandha ādi piṭṭhāni

original: ca yāvajīvikāni. Tesaṃ pāḷiyaṃ kasāvehi ca mūlaphalehi ca saṅghaho veditabbo.
analyzed: ca yāvajīvikāni tesam pāḷiyam kasāvehi ca mūla phalehi ca saṅghahaḥ veditabbo

analyzed: niyyāsa khādanīye ekaḥ ucchu niyyāsaḥ uva satta aha kāliko sesā anujānāmi bhikkhave jatūni

original: sattāhaṃ samāpattiyā nisīdati. Evaṃ dvepi tīṇipi cattāripi sattāhāni vītināmetvā

original: 253. Kāro karaṇaṃ kiriyāti atthato ekaṃ, sannidhikāro assāti sannidhikāraṃ; sannidhikārameva

analyzed: alam mayham iti paṭikkhipati puna tava iva etam mayā ca vutte pi na mayham

original: etenattho”ti vadati. Satakkhattumpi pariccajatu, yāva attano hatthagataṃ paṭiggahitameva hoti.

analyzed: sace pana ādhārake ṭhitam nirapekkhaḥ gaṇhāti vadati puna paṭiggahetabbam sa apekkhaḥ

analyzed: hattham dhovitvā sace pi sata kkhattum gahetvā attano patta gatam a phusantaḥ iva attano

analyzed: patte pakkhipati puna paṭiggahaṇa kiccam natthi yadi pana attanaḥ patta gatam phusitvā

original: tato gaṇhāti, sāmaṇerasantakena saṃsaṭṭhaṃ hoti, puna paṭiggahetabbaṃ. Keci pana

analyzed: sace api gayhamānam chijjitvā tattha patati puna paṭiggahetabbanti vadanti tam

original: “ekaṃ bhattapiṇḍaṃ gaṇha, ekaṃ pūvaṃ gaṇha, imassa guḷapiṇḍassa ettakaṃ padesaṃ gaṇhā”ti

original: Sace attano vā bhikkhūnaṃ vā yāgupacanakabhājane kesañci atthāya odanaṃ pakkhipati,

analyzed: tassa hatthataḥ bhājane patitam hi dutiya divase bhājanassa akappiya bhāvam na karoti

original: Sace paṭiggahaṇūpagaṃ bhāraṃ dve tayo sāmaṇerā denti, ekena vā balavatā ukkhittaṃ

original: Heṭṭhāpāsādaṃ orohanto nisseṇimajjhe sañjānāti, anokāsattā uddhaṃ vā adho vā haritvā

original: taṃsamuṭṭhānameva nāmetaṃ, puna paṭiggahaṇakiccaṃ natthi.

analyzed: vadati na gahetabbam sace aññaḥ bhūmiyam ṭhitaḥ yotta pāsake gahetvā ukkhipitvā deti

analyzed: honti yathāsukham paribhuñjitum vaṭṭati

analyzed: vaṭṭati vati daṇḍakesu a paharitvā niggatam gaṇhantassa vaṭṭati paharitvā niggate

analyzed: kaddame laggati daharaḥ cakkam gahetvā ukkhipati vaṭṭati uggahitakam nāma na hoti

analyzed: phusanti ettha pana mātā pitūnam tela ādīni chāyā ādīnam atthāya sākhā ādīni ca harantānam

original: Sāmaṇero bhattaṃ pacitukāmo taṇḍule dhovitvā niccāletuṃ na sakkoti. Bhikkhunā taṇḍule
analyzed: sāmaṇeraḥ bhattam pacitu kāmo taṇḍule dhovitvā niccāletum na sakkoti bhikkhunā taṇḍule

original: Sāmaṇero paṭibalo pacituṃ, khaṇo panassa natthi, katthaci gantukāmo. Bhikkhunā sataṇḍulodakabhājanaṃ

analyzed: paṭiggahetvā uddhanam āropetvā aggim jāletvā gacchāhi iti vattabbo tatas param purima nayena iva

original: sabbaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭati.
analyzed: sabbam kātum vaṭṭati

analyzed: bhikkhu yāgu atthāya suddham bhājanam āropetvā udakam tāpeti vaṭṭati tatte udake

original: paṭiggahetvā pātuṃ vaṭṭati.
analyzed: paṭiggahetvā pātum vaṭṭati

original: Sāmaṇero yāguṃ pacati, hatthakukkuccako bhikkhu kīḷanto bhājanaṃ āmasati, pidhānaṃ

analyzed: nāma hoti sace pana dabbim vā uḷuṅkam vā gahetvā an ukkhipantaḥ āluḷeti sabbesam

original: Bhikkhunā piṇḍāya caritvā ādhārake patto ṭhapito hoti, tatra ce añño lolabhikkhu

analyzed: gaṇam pūretvā majjhime janapade pi upasampadam karissanti etena upāyena vīsati vagga gaṇam

original: Evamayaṃ vinayadharo tividhassāpi saddhammassa ciraṭṭhitiyā paṭipanno hotīti evamayaṃ

original: Katame cha ānisaṃse labhatīti? Tassādheyyo uposatho, pavāraṇā, saṅghakammaṃ, pabbajjā, upasampadā, nissayaṃ deti sāmaṇeraṃ upaṭṭhāpeti.

original: Ye ime cātuddasiko, pannarasiko, sāmaggiuposatho, saṅghe uposatho, gaṇe puggale uposatho, suttuddeso, pārisuddhi, adhiṭṭhānauposathoti nava uposathā, sabbe te vinayadharāyattā.
analyzed: ye ime cātuddasiko pannarasiko sāmaggi uposatho saṅghe uposatho gaṇe puggale uposatho sutta uddeso pārisuddhi adhiṭṭhāna uposatho ti nava uposathā sabbe te vinaya dhara āyattā

original: Yāpi ca imā cātuddasikā pannarasikā, sāmaggipavāraṇā, saṅghe pavāraṇā gaṇe puggale

analyzed: eva tassa santakā saḥ tāsam sāmī

original: Yānipi imāni apalokanakammaṃ ñattikammaṃ ñattidutiyakammaṃ ñatticatutthakammanti cattāri saṅghakammāni, tāni vinayadharāyattāni.
analyzed: yāni api imāni apalokana kammam ñatti kammam ñatti dutiya kammam ñatti catuttha kammanti cattāri saṅgha kammāni tāni vinaya dhara āyattāni

analyzed: deti sāmaṇeram upaṭṭhāpeti aññaḥ na iva nissayam dātum labhati na sāmaṇeram upaṭṭhāpetum

analyzed: sāditum labhati ettha ca nissaya dānam ca iva sāmaṇera upaṭṭhānañca ekam aṅgam

analyzed: ekadesaḥ āmisa makkhitaḥ na hoti tena padesena gahetum vaṭṭati

original: 632. Uddharitvā vāti sitthāni udakato uddharitvā ekasmiṃ ṭhāne rāsiṃ katvā udakaṃ
analyzed: uddharitvā vāti sitthāni udakataḥ uddharitvā ekasmin ṭhāne rāsim katvā udakam

original: chaḍḍeti. Bhinditvā vāti sitthāni bhinditvā udakagatikāni katvā chaḍḍeti. Paṭiggahe
analyzed: chaḍḍā iti bhinditvā vāti sitthāni bhinditvā udaka gatikāni katvā chaḍḍā iti paṭiggahe

original: vāti paṭiggahena paṭicchanto naṃ paṭiggahe chaḍḍeti. Nīharitvāti bahi nīharitvā chaḍḍeti;
analyzed: vā ati paṭiggahena paṭicchantaḥ nam paṭiggahe chaḍḍeti nīharitvā ati bahi nīharitvā chaḍḍeti

original: evaṃ chaḍḍentassa anāpatti.
analyzed: evam chaḍḍentassa anāpatti

original: 634. Setacchattanti vatthapaliguṇṭhitaṃ paṇḍaracchattaṃ. Kilañjacchattanti vilīvacchattaṃ.
analyzed: seta chattanti vattha pali guṇṭhitam paṇḍara chattam kilañja chattanti vilīva chattam

original: Paṇṇacchattanti tālapaṇṇādīhi yehi kehici kataṃ. Maṇḍalabaddhaṃ salākabaddhanti idaṃ
analyzed: tāla paṇṇa ādīhi yehi kehici katam maṇḍala baddham salāka baddham idam

original: pana tiṇṇampi chattānaṃ pañjaradassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ. Tāni hi maṇḍalabaddhāni ceva
analyzed: pana tiṇṇam pi chattānam pañjara dassana attham vuttam tāni hi maṇḍala baddhāni ca iva

original: honti salākabaddhāni ca. Yampi tatthajātakadaṇḍakena kataṃ ekapaṇṇacchattaṃ hoti,
analyzed: honti salāka baddhāni ca yat pi tattha jātaka daṇḍakena katam eka paṇṇa chattam hoti

original: tampi chattameva. Etesu yaṃkiñci chattaṃ pāṇimhi assāti chattapāṇi. So taṃ chattaṃ
analyzed: tam pi chattam eva etesu yaṃkiñci chattam pāṇimhi assa ati chatta pāṇi saḥ tam chattam

original: dhārayamāno vā aṃse vā katvā ūrumhi vā ṭhapetvā yāva hatthena na muccati, tāvassa
analyzed: dhārayamānaḥ vā aṃse vā katvā ūrumhi vā ṭhapetvā yāva hatthena na muccati tāvassa

original: dhammaṃ desetuṃ na vaṭṭati, desentassa vuttanayena dukkaṭaṃ. Sace panassa añño chattaṃ
analyzed: dhammam desetum na vaṭṭati desentassa vutta nayena dukkaṭam sace panassa chattam

original: dhāreti, chattapādukāya vā ṭhitaṃ hoti, hatthato apagatamatte chattapāṇi nāma na
analyzed: dhārā iti chatta pādukāya vā ṭhitam hoti hatthataḥ apagata matte chattapāṇi nāma na

original: hoti. Tassa dhammaṃ desetuṃ vaṭṭati. Dhammaparicchedo panettha padasodhamme vuttanayeneva veditabbo.
analyzed: hoti tassa dhammam desetum vaṭṭati dhamma paricchedaḥ pana ittha pada sodhamme vutta nayena iva veditabbo

original: 635. Daṇḍapāṇissāti ettha daṇḍo nāma majjhimassa purisassa catuhatthappamāṇo daṇḍapāṇibhāvo panassa chattapāṇimhi vuttanayeneva veditabbo.
analyzed: daṇḍa pāṇissa ti ettha daṇḍaḥ nāma majjhimassa purisassa catu hattha ppamāṇaḥ daṇḍa pāṇi bhāvaḥ panassa chatta pāṇimhi vutta nayena iva veditabbo

original: 636. Satthapāṇimhipi eseva nayo. Asiṃ sannahitvā ṭhitopi hi satthapāṇisaṅkhyaṃ na gacchati.
analyzed: sattha pāṇimhi pi esa iva nayaḥ asim ṭhitaḥ api hi sattha pāṇi saṅkhyam na gacchati

original: 637. Āvudhapāṇissāti ettha kiñcāpi vuttaṃ – “āvudhaṃ nāma cāpo kodaṇḍo”ti, atha kho
analyzed: āvudha pāṇissa ti ettha kiñcā api vuttam āvudham nāma cāpaḥ kodaṇḍo ti atha kho

original: sabbāpi dhanuvikati saddhiṃ saravikatiyā āvudhanti veditabbaṃ. Tasmā saddhiṃ vā sarena
analyzed: sabbā api dhanu vikati saddhim sara vikatiyā veditabbam tasmā saddhim vā sarena

original: dhanuṃ gahetvā suddhadhanuṃ vā suddhasaraṃ vā sajiyadhanuṃ vā nijjiyadhanuṃ vā gahetvā
analyzed: dhanum gahetvā suddha dhanum vā suddha saram vā sajiya dhanum vā nijjiya dhanum vā gahetvā

original: ṭhitassa vā nisinnassa vā dhammo desetuṃ na vaṭṭati. Sace panassa dhanuṃ kaṇṭhepi
analyzed: ṭhitassa vā nisinnassa vā dhammaḥ desetum na vaṭṭati sace panassa dhanum kaṇṭhe pi

original: paṭimukkaṃ hoti, yāva hatthena na gaṇhāti, tāva dhammaṃ desetuṃ vaṭṭatiyevāti.
analyzed: paṭimukkam hoti yāva hatthena na gaṇhāti tāva dhammam desetum vaṭṭatiyā iva ati

original: Chaṭṭho vaggo.
analyzed: chaṭṭhaḥ vaggo

original: 7. Pādukavaggavaṇṇanā
analyzed: pāduka vagga vaṇṇanā

original: 638. Akkantassāti chattadaṇḍake aṅgulantaraṃ appavesetvā kevalaṃ pādukaṃ akkamitvā
analyzed: akkantassa ati chatta daṇḍake aṅgula antaram appavesetvā kevalam pādukam akkamitvā

original: ṭhitassa. Paṭimukkassāti paṭimuñcitvā ṭhitassa. Upāhanāyapi eseva nayo. Omukkoti
analyzed: ṭhitassa paṭimukkassa ati paṭimuñcitvā ṭhitassa esa iva nayaḥ omukkaḥ ti

original: panettha paṇhikabaddhaṃ omuñcitvā ṭhito vuccati.
analyzed: pana ittha paṇhika baddham omuñcitvā ṭhitaḥ vuccati

original: 640. Yānagatassāti ettha sacepi dvīhi janehi hatthasaṅghāṭena gahito, sāṭake vā ṭhapetvā
analyzed: yāna gatassa ati ettha sace pi dvīhi janehi hattha saṅghāṭena gahitaḥ sāṭake vā ṭhapetvā

original: vaṃsena vayhati, ayutte vā vayhādike yāne, visaṅkharitvā vā ṭhapite cakkamattepi
analyzed: vaṃsena ayutte vā vayha ādike yāne visaṅkharitvā vā ṭhapite cakkamatte pi

original: nisinno yānagatotveva saṅkhyaṃ gacchati. Sace pana dvepi ekayāne nisinnā honti, vaṭṭati.
analyzed: nisinnaḥ saṅkhyam gacchati sace pana dve api eka yāne nisinnāḥ honti vaṭṭati

original: Visuṃ nisinnesupi ucce yāne nisinnena nīce nisinnassa desetuṃ vaṭṭati, samappamāṇepi
analyzed: visum nisinnesu pi ucce yāne nisinnena nīce nisinnassa desetum vaṭṭati samappamāṇe pi

original: vaṭṭati. Purime yāne nisinnena pacchime nisinnassa vaṭṭati. Pacchime pana uccatarepi
analyzed: vaṭṭati purime yāne nisinnena pacchime nisinnassa vaṭṭati pacchime pana uccatare pi

original: nisinnena desetuṃ na vaṭṭati.
analyzed: nisinnena desetum na vaṭṭati

original: 641. Sayanagatassāti antamaso kaṭasārakepi pakatibhūmiyampi nipannassa uccepi mañcapīṭhe
analyzed: sayana gatassa ati antamasaḥ kaṭasārake pi pakati bhūmiyam pi nipannassa ucce pi mañca pīṭhe

original: vā bhūmipadese vā ṭhitena nisinnena vā desetuṃ na vaṭṭati. Sayanagatena pana sayanagatassa
analyzed: vā bhūmi padese vā ṭhitena nisinnena vā desetum na vaṭṭati sayana gatena pana sayana gatassa

original: uccatare vā samappamāṇe vā nipannena desetuṃ vaṭṭati. Nipannena ca ṭhitassa vā nisinnassa
analyzed: uccatare vā samappamāṇe vā nipannena desetum vaṭṭati nipannena ca ṭhitassa vā nisinnassa

original: vā desetuṃ vaṭṭati, nisinnenāpi ṭhitassa vā nisinnassa vā vaṭṭati. Ṭhitena ṭhitasseva vaṭṭati.
analyzed: vā desetum vaṭṭati nisinnena api ṭhitassa vā nisinnassa vā vaṭṭati ṭhitena ṭhitassa iva vaṭṭati

original: 642. Pallatthikāyāti āyogapallatthikāya vā hatthapallatthikāya vā dussapallatthikāya vā yāya kāyaci pallatthikāya nisinnassa agilānassa desetuṃ na vaṭṭati.
analyzed: pallatthikāya ati āyoga pallatthikāya vā hattha pallatthikāya vā dussa pallatthikāya vā yāya kāyaci pallatthikāya nisinnassa a gilānassa desetum na vaṭṭati

original: 643. Veṭhitasīsassāti dussaveṭhanena vā moḷiādīhi vā yathā kesanto na dissati; evaṃ veṭhitasīsassa.
analyzed: veṭhita sīsassa ati dussa veṭhanena vā moḷi ādīhi vā yathā kesantaḥ na dissati evam veṭhita sīsassa

original: 644. Oguṇṭhitasīsassāti sasīsaṃ pārutassa.
analyzed: oguṇṭhita sīsassa ati sa sīsam pārutassa

original: 645. Chamāyaṃ nisinnenāti bhūmiyaṃ nisinnena. Āsane nisinnassāti antamaso vatthampi tiṇānipi santharitvā nisinnassa.
analyzed: chamāyam nisinnena ati bhūmiyam nisinnena āsane nisinnassa ati antamasaḥ vattham pi tiṇāni pi santharitvā nisinnassa

original: 647. Chapakassāti caṇḍālassa. Chapakīti caṇḍālī. Nilīnoti paṭicchanno hutvā. Yatra
analyzed: chapakassa ati caṇḍālassa chapakī iti caṇḍālī nilīnaḥ ti paṭicchannaḥ hutvā yatra

original: hi nāmāti yo hi nāma. Sabbamidaṃ carimaṃ katanti tattheva paripatīti “sabbo ayaṃ
analyzed: hi nāma ati yaḥ hi nāma sabbam idam carimam katanti tattha iva paripati iti sabbaḥ ayam

original: loko saṅkaraṃ gato nimmariyādo”ti imaṃ vacanaṃ vatvā tattheva tesaṃ dvinnampi antarā
analyzed: lokaḥ saṅkaram gataḥ imam vacanam vatvā tattha iva tesam dvinnam pi antarā

original: rukkhato patito. Patitvā ca pana ubhinnampi purato ṭhatvā imaṃ gāthaṃ abhāsi –
analyzed: rukkhataḥ patitaḥ patitvā ca pana ubhinnam pi puratas ṭhatvā imam gātham abhāsi

original: “Ubho atthaṃ na jānanti…pe… asmā kumbhamivābhidā”ti.
analyzed: ubho attham na jānantipe asmai kumbham iva abhidāti

original: Tattha ubho atthaṃ na jānantīti dvepi janā pāḷiyā atthaṃ na jānanti. Dhammaṃ na passareti
analyzed: tattha ubho attham na jānanti iti dve api janā pāḷiyāḥ attham na jānanti dhammam na passara iti

original: pāḷiṃ na passanti. Katame te ubhoti? “Yo cāyaṃ mantaṃ vāceti, yo cādhammenadhīyatī”ti.
analyzed: pāḷim na passanti katame te ubho ti yaḥ ca ayam mantam vācā iti yaḥ ca adhammena adhīyati iti

original: Evaṃ brāhmaṇañca rājānañca ubhopi adhammikabhāve ṭhapesi.
analyzed: evam brāhmaṇañca rājānañca ubho api adhammika bhāve ṭhapesi

original: Tato brāhmaṇo sālīnanti gāthamāha. Tassattho – jānāmahaṃ bho “ayaṃ adhammo”ti; api
analyzed: tatas brāhmaṇaḥ sālīnam ti gātham āha tassa atthaḥ jānāmaham bho ayam adhammaḥ ti api

analyzed: ca kho mayā dīgharattam sa putta dāra parijanena rañño santakaḥ sālīnam odanaḥ bhuttaḥ

original: Sucimaṃsūpasecanoti nānappakāravikatisampāditaṃ sucimaṃsūpasecanaṃ missīkaraṇamassāti
analyzed: suci maṃsūpasecanā ti nānappakāra vikati sampāditam suci maṃsūpasecanam missīkaraṇam assa ati

original: sucimaṃsūpasecano. Tasmā dhamme na vattāmīti yasmā evaṃ mayā rañño odano bhutto,
analyzed: tasmai dhamme na vattāmi iti yasmai evam mayā raññaḥ odanaḥ bhutto

original: aññe ca bahū lābhā laddhā, tasmā dhamme ahaṃ na vattāmi udare baddho hutvā, na dhammaṃ
analyzed: aññe ca bahū lābhā laddhā tasmai dhamme aham na vattāmi udare baddhaḥ hutvā na dhammaṃ

original: ajānanto. Ayañhi dhammo ariyehi vaṇṇito pasattho thomitoti jānāmi.
analyzed: a jānantaḥ ayam hi dhammaḥ ariyehi vaṇṇito pasatthaḥ thomito ti jānāmi

original: Atha naṃ chapako “dhiratthū”tiādinā gāthādvayena ajjhabhāsi. Tassattho – yo tayā
analyzed: atha nam chapakaḥ dhiratthūti ādinā gāthā dvayena ajjhabhāsi tassa atthaḥ yaḥ tayā

original: dhanalābho ca yasalābho ca laddho, dhiratthu taṃ dhanalābhaṃ yasalābhañca brāhmaṇa.
analyzed: dhana lābhaḥ ca yasa lābhaḥ ca laddhaḥ dhiratthu tam dhana lābham yasa lābham ca brāhmaṇa

original: Kasmā? Yasmā ayaṃ tayā laddho lābho āyatiṃ apāyesu vinipātanahetunā sampati ca adhammacaraṇena
analyzed: kasmai yasmai ayam tayā laddhaḥ lābhaḥ āyatim apāyesu vinipātana hetunā ca adhamma caraṇena

original: vutti nāma hoti. Evarūpā yā vutti āyatiṃ vinipātena idha adhammacaraṇena vā nippajjati,
analyzed: vutti nāma hoti evarūpā yā vutti āyatim vinipātena idha adhamma caraṇena vā nippajjati

original: kiṃ tāya vuttiyā? Tena vuttaṃ –
analyzed: kim tāya vuttiyā tena vuttam

original: “Dhiratthu taṃ dhanalābhaṃ, yasalābhañca brāhmaṇa;
analyzed: tam dhana lābham yasa lābham ca brāhmaṇa

original: Yā vutti vinipātena, adhammacaraṇena vā”ti.
analyzed: yā vutti vinipātena adhamma caraṇena vāti

original: Paribbaja mahābrahmeti mahābrāhmaṇa ito disā sīghaṃ palāyassu. Pacantaññepi pāṇinoti
analyzed: paribbaja mahā brahma iti mahā brāhmaṇaḥ itas disā sīgham palāyassu pacantaññe pi pāṇinā ti

original: aññepi sattā pacanti ceva bhuñjanti ca; na kevalaṃ tvañceva rājā ca. Mā tvaṃ adhammo
analyzed: aññe pi sattā pacanti ca iva bhuñjanti ca na kevalam tvam ca iva rājā ca mā tvam adhammaḥ

original: ācarito asmā kumbhamivābhidāti sace hi tvaṃ ito aparibbajitvā imaṃ adhammaṃ ācarissasi,
analyzed: ācaritaḥ asmai kumbham iva abhidāti sace hi tvam itas a paribbajitvā imam adhammam ācarissasi

original: tato tvaṃ so adhammo evaṃ ācarito yathā udakakumbhaṃ pāsāṇo bhindeyya; evaṃ bhecchati,

original: tena mayaṃ taṃ vadāma –
analyzed: tena mayam tam vadāma

original: “Paribbaja mahābrahme, pacantaññepi pāṇino;
analyzed: paribbaja mahābrahme pacantaññe pi pāṇinaḥ

original: Mā tvaṃ adhammo ācarito, asmā kumbhamivābhidā”ti.
analyzed: mā tvam a dhammaḥ ācaritaḥ asmai kumbham iva abhidāti

original: Ucce āsaneti antamaso bhūmippadesepi unnataṭṭhāne nisinnassa desetuṃ na vaṭṭati.
analyzed: ucce āsane iti antamasaḥ bhūmi ppadese pi unnata ṭṭhāne nisinnassa desetum na vaṭṭati

original: 648. Na ṭhito nisinnassāti sacepi therupaṭṭhānaṃ gantvā ṭhitaṃ daharabhikkhuṃ āsane
analyzed: na ṭhitaḥ nisinnassa ati sace pi thera upaṭṭhānam gantvā ṭhitam dahara bhikkhum āsane

original: nisinno mahāthero pañhaṃ pucchati, na kathetabbaṃ. Gāravena pana theraṃ uṭṭhahitvā
analyzed: nisinnaḥ mahā theraḥ pañham pucchati na kathetabbam gāravena pana theram uṭṭhahitvā

original: pucchathāti vattuṃ na sakkā, passe ṭhitabhikkhussa kathemīti kathetuṃ vaṭṭati.
analyzed: pucchatha ati vattum na sakkā passe ṭhita bhikkhussa kathemi iti kathetum vaṭṭati

original: 649. Na pacchato gacchantenāti ettha sace purato gacchanto pacchato gacchantaṃ pañhaṃ
analyzed: na pacchatas gacchantena ati sace puratas gacchantaḥ pacchatas gacchantam

original: pucchati, na kathetabbaṃ. Pacchimassa bhikkhuno kathemīti kathetuṃ vaṭṭati. Saddhiṃ
analyzed: pucchati na kathetabbam pacchimassa bhikkhuno kathemi iti kathetum vaṭṭati saddhim

original: uggahitadhammaṃ pana sajjhāyituṃ vaṭṭati. Samadhurena gacchantassa kathetuṃ vaṭṭati.
analyzed: uggahita dhammam pana sajjhāyitum vaṭṭati sa madhurena gacchantassa kathetum vaṭṭati

original: 650. Na uppathenāti etthāpi sace dvepi sakaṭapathe ekekacakkapathena vā uppathena vā samadhuraṃ gacchanti, vaṭṭati.
analyzed: na uppathena ati ettha api sace dve pi sakaṭa pathe ekeka cakka pathena vā uppathena vā samadhuram gacchanti vaṭṭati

original: 651. Asañciccāti paṭicchannaṭṭhānaṃ gacchantassa sahasā uccāro vā passāvo vā nikkhamati, asañcicca kato nāma anāpatti.
analyzed: a sañcicca ati paṭicchanna ṭhānam gacchantassa sahasā uccāraḥ vā passāvaḥ vā nikkhamati asañcicca kataḥ nāma anāpatti

original: 652. Na hariteti ettha yampi jīvarukkhassa mūlaṃ pathaviyaṃ dissamānaṃ gacchati,
analyzed: na haritā iti ettha yam pi jīva rukkhassa mūlam pathaviyam dissamānam gacchati

original: sākhā vā bhūmilaggā gacchati, sabbaṃ haritasaṅkhātameva. Khandhe nisīditvā appaharitaṭṭhāne
analyzed: sākhā vā bhūmi laggā gacchati sabbam harita saṅkhātam eva khandhe nisīditvā appaharita ṭṭhāne

original: pātetuṃ vaṭṭati. Appaharitaṭṭhānaṃ olokentasseva sahasā nikkhamati, gilānaṭṭhāne
analyzed: pātetum vaṭṭati appaharita ṭṭhānaṃ olokentassa iva sahasā nikkhamati gilāna ṭṭhāne

original: ṭhito hoti, vaṭṭati. Appaharite katoti appaharitaṃ alabhantena tiṇaṇḍupakaṃ vā palālaṇḍupakaṃ
analyzed: ṭhitaḥ hoti vaṭṭati appaharite kato ti appaharitam a labhantena tiṇaṇḍupakam vā

original: vā ṭhapetvā katopi pacchā haritaṃ ottharati, vaṭṭatiyeva. Kheḷena cettha siṅghāṇikāpi
analyzed: vā ṭhapetvā kataḥ api pacchā haritam ottharati vaṭṭatiyā iva kheḷena ca ittha siṅghāṇikā api

original: saṅgahitāti mahāpaccariyaṃ vuttaṃ.
analyzed: saṅgahitā iti mahā paccariyam vuttam

original: 653. Na udaketi etaṃ paribhogaudakameva sandhāya vuttaṃ, vaccakuṭisamuddādiudakesu
analyzed: na udaka iti etam paribhoga odakam eva sandhāya vuttam vacca kuṭi samudda ādi udakesu

original: pana aparibhogesu anāpatti. Deve vassante samantato udakogho hoti, anudakaṭṭhānaṃ
analyzed: pana a paribhogesu anāpatti deve vassante samantataḥ udaka ogho hoti an udakaṭṭhānaṃ

original: olokentasseva nikkhamati, vaṭṭati. Mahāpaccariyaṃ vuttaṃ – “etādise kāle anudakaṭṭhānaṃ
analyzed: olokentassa iva nikkhamati vaṭṭati mahā paccariyam vuttam etādise kāle an udakaṭṭhānam

original: alabhantena kātuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti. Sesaṃ sabbasikkhāpadesu uttānatthameva.
analyzed: a labhantena kātum vaṭṭati iti sesam sabba sikkhāpadesu uttānattham eva

original: Sattamo vaggo.
analyzed: sattamaḥ vaggo

original: vadati – “mama ca tava ca kathaṃ tvaṃyeva ārocehī”ti, so attano vā kathaṃ paṭhamaṃ
analyzed: vadati mama ca tava ca katham ārocehi iti saḥ vā katham paṭhamam

original: ārocetu bhikkhuniyā vā, paṭhamārocane dukkaṭaṃ, dutiyārocane thullaccayaṃ. Upāsako
analyzed: ārocetu bhikkhuniyāḥ vā paṭhama ārocane dukkaṭam dutiya ārocane thullaccayam upāsako

original: bhikkhuniṃ vadati – “mama ca tava ca kathaṃ tvaṃyeva ārocehī”ti, etthāpi eseva nayo.
analyzed: bhikkhunim vadati mama ca tava ca katham tvaṃ yeva ārocehi iti ettha api esa iva nayo

original: Bhikkhunī kappiyakārakena kathāpeti, tattha kappiyakārako vā bhikkhuniyā kathaṃ paṭhamaṃ
analyzed: bhikkhunī kappiya kārakena kathāpeti tattha kappiya kārako vā bhikkhuniyā katham paṭhamam

original: ārocetu, itaro vā attano kathaṃ, kappiyakārako vā ubhinnampi kathaṃ, itaro vā ubhinnampi

original: kathaṃ ārocetu, yathā vā tathā vā ārociyamāne paṭhame ārocane bhikkhuniyā dukkaṭaṃ,
analyzed: katham ārocetu yathā vā tathā vā ārociyamāne paṭhame ārocane bhikkhuniyā dukkaṭam

original: dutiye thullaccayaṃ. Yathā vā tathā vā ārocitaṃ pana ubhinnampi kathaṃ sutvā vohārikehi

original: Atha te bhikkhuniñca aḍḍakārakañca disvāva “tumhākaṃ kathanakiccaṃ natthi, jānāma

analyzed: paṭhamam āpatti etassa ati paṭhama āpattikaḥ vītikkama khaṇeya iva āpajjitabbaḥ ti attho

analyzed: mayam rakkham yācāma tam naḥ detha avahaṭa bhaṇḍam ca āhara apetha iti vattabbam evam
